pageContext.claim: Who is Miles Taylor? Said he was "anonymous", but I don't know him - never even heard of him. Just another @nytimes SCAM - he worked in conjunction with them. Also worked for Big Tech's @Google. Now works for Fake News @CNN. They should fire, shame, and punish everybody.‚Äù
pageContext.analysis: Miles Taylor was chief of staff at the Department of Homeland Security and posed for photos with Trump in the Oval Office. Taylor tweeted one of those photos.
